New Records: Luka Doncic recorded 32 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists, setting a strong individual performance.
The Dallas Mavericks achieved a season-high 53 rebounds as a team.
Key Match Events: The Mavericks outscored the Magic 30-9 in the first 9:30 of the second quarter, establishing a significant early lead.
The Magic struggled with a season-worst 19.5% three-point shooting (8 of 41).
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando played without Paolo Banchero, who was recovering from a torn right oblique, and Wendell Carter Jr., who was limited due to a plantar fascia strain.
The Mavericks emphasized defensive efforts and fast-break points, outscoring the Magic 19-12 in those scenarios.
Others: The game was notable for the Mavericks' ability to dominate early and maintain a large lead, as well as the Magic's struggles without key players.
